name: Rotate It (forkstudios)
description:
You need to go to finish line by creating way to it with blocks.

Player Movement: W,A,S,D

RotateObjects: Q , E

This is just a beginning of the project i must create it shorter because i will not have a much time to publish it on itch.io 

This project is for Kenney Jam.

Version 1.1

I added PostProcessing, backround music, re-design levels a more.

In future updates I will add more levels for now the game have only 3 levels

Also I add respawn system. If you touch the ground below blocks you will be respawned at start of the level.

Also I re-designed UI now it looks much much better.
